title: How to Cook Brown Rice and Lentils Together in a Rice Cooker

steps.title: Rinse and drain the lentils and rice (you may wish to wash them together for the sake of time) multiple times, either using a wire strainer or the pot of your rice cooker.
steps.content: Rinse and drain the lentils and rice (you may wish to wash them together for the sake of time) multiple times, either using a wire strainer or the pot of your rice cooker.

steps.title: Add the lentils, rice, water/stock, and, optionally, seasoning and pre-cooked vegetables.
steps.content: Add the lentils, rice, water/stock, and, optionally, seasoning and pre-cooked vegetables.

steps.title: When finished, unplug the cooker and set it aside with the lid partially removed to allow the food to cool a bit.
steps.content: When finished, unplug the cooker and set it aside with the lid partially removed to allow the food to cool a bit.
